description: Quantum Metric is a continuous product design platform that helps organizations build better products faster.
Outlier Company

RD Station is the leading player in Brazil’s digital marketing space, offering an all-in-one, low-cost marketing automation software to help businesses leverage inbound marketing techniques to organically attract clients. RD was acquired in 2021 in the largest M&A deal in the history of the Brazilian start-up tech sector.

RobinFood is Latin America´s largest cloud-restaurant company. The company has created a foodservice house of brands with a proprietary tech platform to increase efficiency and user satisfaction, operating under an asset light model and centralization to decrease costs.

SalesLoft is a SaaS-based sales engagement platform that helps sales representatives set and execute on a cadence of phone, email and social communications to turn more target accounts into customers. SalesLoft became a unicorn in 2021.
Sallve is a beauty D2C brand that is revolutionizing the cosmetics space in Brazil.
Sansan provides a cloud-based data management service for companies to improve communications and sales. In 2019, Sansan was listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange (TSE).

With a mission to digitize and revolutionize the wholesale market, Sary is an online B2B marketplace that connects small businesses with a network of wholesale market suppliers and distributors via mobile and web applications.
Satellogic is a nano-satellite company that produces commercial-grade, affordable Earth observation data for daily decision making.
Seedtag is a contextual advertising company which uses AI technology based on Machine Learning algorithms to power the most relevant and engaging communications in a privacy-first world.

Shipper is one of the fastest growing technology companies in Indonesia, providing end-to-end digital supply chain solutions for businesses of all sizes in a market where last mile fulfillment and delivery is estimated at $80B.

Sky Mavis is a technology company that creates decentralized blockchain applications. It’s hit video game Axie Infinity, the #1 Ethereum game by daily, weekly, and Monthly active users, is a player-owned game universe where players can own, buy, sell, and trade resources to “play-and-earn”.

SonderMind is a U.S. based mental health platform that gives individuals access to high-quality, in-network therapists, and manages the complexities of therapists’ private practice compliance and billing.
Squire is a business management software for barbershops and men’s salons.
Strong Roots offers tasty, plant-based, and environmentally responsible frozen foods designed for busy lives.
Swvl’s is a mobility platform that is transforming mass transit in major cities by providing affordable, app-based bus transportation. It became Egypt’s fastest growing unicorn in 2021.

Symend helps enterprise clients design, execute and optimize digital customer engagement campaigns. Its no-code turn-key solution solves the tricky churn problem that plagues mature markets like cellular subscribers, & more.
SYNQA’s “Omise” provides merchants an end-to-end payments platform that enables them to accept, process, and disburse payments online, in-store and in-app.
Tabby is the first licensed FinTech company to provide a Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL) solution across the GCC.
Tarfin finances high-quality agricultural inputs for farmers in Turkey through widespread sales points.
